sentences.en: A clean conscience fears not false accusations.
sentences.cn: 身正不怕影子歪.

sentences.en: A clear conscience laughs at false accusations.
sentences.cn: 只要问心无愧,旁人的指责可以一笑置之.

sentences.en: a crisis of conscience among medical staff (= a situation in which it is very difficult to decide what is the right thing to do )
sentences.cn: 医务人员中的良心危机

sentences.en: A quiet conscience sleeps in thunder.
sentences.cn: 白天不做亏心事,夜里不怕鬼敲门.

sentences.en: After he had committed the crime, his conscience was troubled.
sentences.cn: 他犯罪后, 良心上感到很不安.

sentences.en: an act of providence had prevented him from having a death on his conscience.
sentences.cn: 天意阻止了他因良心谴责而自杀。

sentences.en: Guilt had been eating into his conscience for some months.
sentences.cn: 几个月来内疚一直折磨着他的良心.

sentences.en: Has your action never given you a twinge of conscience?
sentences.cn: 你做这事不屈心 吗 ?

sentences.en: how can we in all conscience justify the charging of fees for such a service?.
sentences.cn: 我们怎么才能凭良心证明为这种服务收费是合理的？。

sentences.en: I can’t tell you what to do – it’s a matter of conscience (= something that you must make a moral judgment about ) .
sentences.cn: 我不能告诉你怎么办——这是良心问题。

sentences.en: I would like your advice on a matter of conscience, Father.
sentences.cn: 我想就一件有关良心的事征求您的建议，神父。

sentences.en: I'm so glad he had a pang of conscience.
sentences.cn: 我很高兴他会有负疚感。

sentences.en: It's pleasing to see some criminals have a conscience.
sentences.cn: 看到有些罪犯还有良知让人感到欣慰。

sentences.en: Mr Garcia said his conscience was clear over the jail incidents.
sentences.cn: 加西亚先生说他对监狱中发生的事件问心无愧。

sentences.en: She behaves as if she has something on her conscience.
sentences.cn: 她好像做了什么亏心事.

sentences.en: The Daily Mail has the headline "The Voice of Conscience"
sentences.cn: 《每日邮报》的头版标题为“良知的声音”。

sentences.en: The kind advice rests easily on one's conscience.
sentences.cn: 好言劝慰使人宽心.

sentences.en: The matter weighed upon his conscience.
sentences.cn: 这件事使他的良心痛苦不安.

sentences.en: Well, at least I can face them all with a clear conscience (= the knowledge that you have done nothing wrong ) .
sentences.cn: 好吧，至少我可以问心无愧地面对他们所有人。

sentences.en: What if he got a guilty conscience and brought it back?
sentences.cn: 要是他觉得内疚，把东西拿回来了怎么办？

words.tran_cn: 认真的；尽责的；本着良心的；小心谨慎的

phrases.tran_cn: 令人感到内疚；受到良心谴责

trans.tran_en: the part of your mind that tells you whether what you are doing is morally right or wrong
